description: Detects direct modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry using reg.exe.
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reasons.
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reasons.
name: Direct Autorun Keys Modification
query: (process.executable.text:*\\reg.exe AND process.command_line.text:*add* AND process.command_line.text:(*\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run* OR *\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Winlogon\\Userinit* OR *\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Winlogon\\Shell* OR *\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Windows* OR *\\software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Explorer\\User\ Shell\ Folders* OR *\\system\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\SafeBoot\\AlternateShell*))
author: Victor Sergeev
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
oscd.community
